method: **Introduction:** Complete the Necromancy! quest. Perform rituals at the Well of Souls to construct your Tier 10 equipment.
tips: Focus on upgrading your gear as soon as possible via Kili's tasks.

method: **City of Um Rituals:** Perform the highest level communal ritual you can. Lesser Communion, then Greater Communion.
tips: Always click the disturbances (moths, glittering glyphs, wandering souls) for massive bonus XP.

method: **Hermod (Boss):** At level 60, farm Hermod for plates needed for T70-90 armor upgrades. Rituals (Secure/Powerful Communion) are still top XP.
tips: Use **Multiply Glyphs** on your ritual site to drastically increase soul attraction and XP from disturbances.

method: **Abyssal Savages / Beasts:** Aggressive combat training in the Wilderness or Player Slayer Dungeon.
tips: Use Ghost, Skeleton, and Zombie conjures. Revolution bar makes this very AFK with T90 tank gear.

method: **Powerful Communion / Disturbances:** With full Multiply III glyphs, this is the best XP in the game (1.5m - 2m XP/hr actively).
tips: Join 'Necro Rituals' FC or world 84 (lag warning) for community buffs.
